website_summaries.verdict: Teva’s response to the demands of the hiking community is the trendy Tirra. This superbly lightweight yet supportive multi-sport sandal offers high levels of comfort and durability. It is also praised as a quick-drying footgear that performs well in wet conditions. It provides excellent ground stability and surface traction.However, there are people who shot it down for its abrasive ankle straps, and sweat-inducing footbed. All in all, it remains a likable athletic hiking sandal despite its reported criticisms.
pros: Users by the hundreds are quick to applaud the Teva Tirra’s incredible durability
This strappy hiker’s arch support is nothing short of fantastic, based on numerous positive user reviews
Teva Tirra’s extreme level of comfort astounds scores of verified purchasers
They attribute most of this quality to the sandal’s cushy footbed, and a user with plantar fasciitis—after not feeling any pain over a few days’ use—couldn’t agree more
This hiking sandal is a powerhouse when it comes to surface traction, according to a moderate percentage of users
Some hikers greatly appreciate this sandal for keeping their footing steady on uneven terrain
Several users, which include a hiking blogger, strongly admire the Tirra’s air-like lightness
This hiking footgear impresses many owners with its quick-drying feature
The Tirra hiking sandal from Teva pleases a wide portion of female hikers as it did not require a break-in period at all
They love how it was comfortable right out of the box
cons: A number of users became utterly dismayed about the Teva Tirra’s scratchy and short ankle straps
Several wearers criticized the sandal’s footbed for making their feet sweat profusely
A handful of owners expressed their disappointment with the sandal’s forefoot straps for leaving too much space even when they are strapped all the way in

customer_reviews.title: Useful addition to collection
customer_reviews.text: Initially, sandals felt really dense underfoot. Could feel the ridges in the rather firm foot-bed and feared these and the straps around ankles would cause friction over time. Was pleasantly surprised to return from a 100 minute country walk quite early on and before properly breaking them in, without a single blister. In fact, these are fast becoming my 'heavy duty' sandals. A size 5 does feel a trifle wide and large, (am 4.5 - 5) but better than having feet spilling out. Further, having flat feet, I like it that the foot is well-supported. It's always good to alternate shoes, but these are definitely a useful addition to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Too small & soles very hard/uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Not a patch on comfort compared to my other Teva sandals. There seems to be a ridge running across the arch of the foot. Don't know if this is supposed to be supportive but I found it just dug in & caused cramp in my foot. Also, very small on size, feet were right to the edge so offers no protection on stubbing the toes. Very disappointed, really wanted to like these!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs R

customer_reviews.title: Great summer walking sandal !
customer_reviews.text: These are brilliant excellent fit and comfortable and great for uneven terrain I walk my dog on coastal beaches and cliff paths and when it’s hot in the summer these are great instead of boots and trainers .They grip well and cope with getting wet in showers or the sea -a quick rinse afterwards and they dry out fairly quickly -I’ve used them on boats as well as you feel confident you won’t slip and no problem if you’re feet get wet in them Very pleased with their performance would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tommo

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair I have bought and I lived in them all summer. They can be custom adjusted by you to fit your feet exactly and they work well, in my opinion, both for summer walking and for normal walking around. If you struggle to find sandal that fit these are almost certainly for you. I have another pair in a light colour and tried waking them as they had got grubby, they came up really well. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: CantVal

customer_reviews.title: Love them...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect - I love them and have 3 pairs, all different colours... blue, pink and now black. I highly recommended. I have found that some of these come up slightly larger than others. Not sure why but it hasn’t stopped me buying them. Great for walking, cycling, driving, wet conditions and are generally great all round long comfortable walking on cloud experiences 😁
customer_reviews.author: Julie Had

customer_reviews.title: Buy one if you can still find one
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sandals. I wore them on several travels for years, also used them in showers, swimming in the sea, hiking, etc. Simply just wonderful. However the sole started to loose a bit recently (whitch is normal after this heavy duty -26 to +38 Celsius use), now after 3 years Im buying my second pair. First one stays as my city walker.
customer_reviews.author: Lívia M.

customer_reviews.title: Teva womens sandals
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of Teva sandals previously but as they were a few years old I needed to replace them as some of the cushioning had worn off. These are great sandals but my only criticism (hence the 4 star rating) is that the ankle strap could do with being a bit longer & I don't have big ankles!! I had some chafing on the heel which I didn't expect but that improved & have worn them most of the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly96

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a worn out pair of a different brand. I was slightly worried that I wouldn't like the change, but had read some good reviews of these and was not disappointed. I wore them on holiday in Athens where I walked miles and they didn't rub at all, so very pleased with them. I felt ok about wearing them with skirts too, also a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Stone

customer_reviews.title: Did two or three problem-free six mile plus walks straight out of box
customer_reviews.text: Bought as present about two weeks ago for friend who does regular long walks of six mile plus, and has been having some problem with her feet. I remembered that an old friend--another long walker--in the past swore by Teva sandals. It's only a preliminary report, but so far she's totally satisfied with them
customer_reviews.author: George Brown

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately had to return these as they were too small. Bought a size 8 but actually needed a 9. Ended up with a men’s 9 as 8 was the largest in this style for ladies. I am a standard ladies uk8 in all other shoes and boots.
customer_reviews.author: GeeEmmBee

customer_reviews.title: Feminine not frumpy
customer_reviews.text: Look feminine, not frumpy. I am a size 5-and-a-half feet but bought size 6 sandals and they fit the shape of my feet great. Can see the colour of toenail varnish, cool. Given me 2 small blisters on toes for first 2 walks in them, but hopefully the material will ease and not do that once I've worn them more/done them up at a different tension on my next walks.
customer_reviews.author: Anny W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sandals for comfort and functionality - highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. Great buy. Worn them non-stop over the summer and they are really comfortable. Good for long walks and dry out easily. I've got a bunion on my left foot that gets quite sore and the front adjusting straps are great. Would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: SLMHP

customer_reviews.title: Secure sandals
customer_reviews.text: No slipping and sliding in these sandals making them great for long walks or shopping trips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Early days,but do far very good
customer_reviews.text: Feel very solid and are very comfortable. Was worried that the non-adjustable heel strap might be uncomfortable, but isn't a problem. It is early days,but so far I'm very pleased with them. I do like the fact that there isn't a huge rim around the footbed which can be a bit awkward.
customer_reviews.author: caz

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: The ankle strap sat very high around my ankle an was hard and uncomfortable as were the other rigid straps
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sandals
customer_reviews.text: These are my third pair of Teva sandals, second of Tirra. Super comfy and great for a day out and lots of outdoor activities. I hope they continue making them.
customer_reviews.author: S.M.

customer_reviews.title: The best walking sandals I have tried.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these sandals I have bought, as I wear them all the time for walking on a variety of terrains, and my previous pair are wearing a bit thin on the soles. The fact that all the straps are adjustable makes them easy to fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable sandals I have ever bought. Fantastic price
customer_reviews.author: Gam14

customer_reviews.title: Teva Ladies Sandles
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with my feet, but with these sandals, I have no problems they are so comfortable I can walk for miles and it feels like I am walking on air
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for general holiday use when doing lots of walking. Extremely comfortable but wish there were more interesting and vibrant colours.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: I love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: really comfy, arrived quickly. I walk to work (a mile) and am very impressed with them, they are very comfy and I like the look of them. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Emma B

customer_reviews.title: I've been looking for a pair of sandals that I ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a pair of sandals that I can wear all day, for up to 16 hrs and these fit the bill. They are really comforatable. The only negative point is that they could do with a little more velcro on the straps at the front, as my feet are fairly narrow and the ends are curling up ever so slightly. I have odd sized feet, one is 5-5.5 and the other is a little larger. I bought size 6 and it's a comfy fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and comfy, great to wear all day, every day!!
customer_reviews.text: Love them, took them travelling and they were very comfy and easy to wear. Love the adjustable straps for when my feet got too hot and swollen from walking all day. Soles nice and comfy and provide good support, would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb!!!
customer_reviews.text: Usually sandals are awkward on my feet, I fell never comfortable. But not these ones! I worn them everyday while on holiday.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these sandals before and for a number of years. They are very comfortable and I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sims

customer_reviews.title: Size advice
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually size 5 or 6, i bought these in 6 and they are perfect fit. So if in doubt, size up might be better
customer_reviews.author: Kakalios

customer_reviews.title: Teva sandales
customer_reviews.text: Tried them on in a shop before buying online... very comfortable feeling. Having not walked in them yet... hopefully the summer will come soon.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wore these right out of the box hiking El Camino de Santiago and didn't get blisters. They are very comfortable and well padded. Even after walking 10+ miles my feet still felt okay in these sandals. They are waterproof and the straps dry quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Karlee Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but break in first
customer_reviews.text: Bought these sandals for a two week holiday visiting cities, knowing there would be a lot of walking. After the first couple of days my feet were really sore and I had to change shoes. However, I tried them again a few days later and they were perfect, really comfortable and I did the rest of my trip with them on. I would recommend them but definitely break them in before taking on any long walks!
customer_reviews.author: ccinoxford

customer_reviews.title: They don't fit well and therefore are uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The minute I wore these sandals they hurt the side of my foot. They are so difficult to fit even though I have a wide foot. I am so so disappointed with them, very annoying and very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie

customer_reviews.title: really comfortable. My second pair
customer_reviews.text: really comfortable. My second pair; the sole of the first pair was becoming slightly less supportive after 5 years, although they still looked pretty good. Hope they are still around in another 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: illachi

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Although I am a regular size 5, these were at least a size too small. Would recommend anyone ordering to order the next size up to get a reasonable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Solo

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait for Barcelona
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time or even earlier, true to size and very comfy
customer_reviews.author: shirley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect again
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me. All the straps adjustable. Smart and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy the feel.
customer_reviews.text: Was nervous about purchasing sandals online but when I saw these I took a chance. I'm glad I did as they fit perfectly and at times didn't realize I was wearing sandals
customer_reviews.author: Mama2Nini

customer_reviews.title: order a larger size
customer_reviews.text: I take US 6, but ordered US 7, as I have found in the past that Tevas are on the small size. There are so many adjustments that it si not a problem. However the top strap did rub my skin raw on my left foot as it is rather hard at the edges
customer_reviews.author: sunnygirl

customer_reviews.title: Style has changed and not for the better!
customer_reviews.text: Have worn these sandals for years and love them but the strap fastenings on this pair are far too short - Hard to fit my wide feet. Such a shame when a good product changes. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, supportive sandals I can walk for miles in
customer_reviews.author: whowantstoknow

customer_reviews.title: Good for people with larger ankles and heels
customer_reviews.text: Too big around the ankle for me, swamped my feet. Good for people with larger ankles and heels.
customer_reviews.author: Northern Linguist

customer_reviews.title: So far I am very pleased with my trekking sandals
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very pleased with my trekking sandals. The fit is very good and comfortable. Well done Teva, would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Fuller

customer_reviews.title: ... a job with sandals fitting but these are so comfortable Wear them very day
customer_reviews.text: Usually have a job with sandals fitting but these are so comfortable Wear them very day.
customer_reviews.author: MrsLAF

customer_reviews.title: Good value and as described
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, comfy and good fit with plenty of scope to adjust fitting with the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my purchase 🙂 Can warm recommende others to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase 🙂 Can warm recommende others to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Jakobsen

customer_reviews.title: Teva Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my Teva sandals for summer season. Quick delivery and a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Reiko

customer_reviews.title: Teva sandels
customer_reviews.text: Not worn yet but feel very comfortable when I tried them on.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: shame, well made.
customer_reviews.text: Shame about the ankle strap being too far up and pushing down on tendons when walking because everything else was great, good support and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Raven maid

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these sanders - very comfy yo wear and lots of straps which can be adjusted
customer_reviews.author: Una Murray

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: dont like the synthetic soles.hard on the feet.Rubber soles are better
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Comfy footwear.
customer_reviews.text: Loved them. Colour is a safe option. Great fit as fully adjustable which is great for narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: Cheshire Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable easy wear sandles
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fitting sandles. Comfortable all day long with adjustable width straps for added comfort. Excellent buy
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Miller

customer_reviews.title: Super-duper sandals 'n' service!
customer_reviews.text: Super product, sandals were just what I expected; bonus was that they arrived in super-fast time, much quicker than expected (and delivered with a smile). One happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: S. Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Good product; my pair was slightly too big
customer_reviews.text: Good product; my pair was slightly too big, but that was my fault because I didn't correctly gauge the different sizes from the US sizing chart. Good quality sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good fit, fast enough delivery. Not quite as "red" as I expected but still nice.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging and prompt delivery
customer_reviews.text: Little bit small fit but hopefully they will stretch a bit! Really comfy footbed. Great packaging and prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Maire Ni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for summer walking activities but also looks good enough to wear out casually.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: But I do love them.
customer_reviews.text: This sandal should be a 5. An American 7. Everywhere I buy in England sell an American 6.5 as an English 5. It would not fit if it were not a sandal. But I do love them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J Brown

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the shoe, but the front strap pushed down on my hammer toe and caused pain. Sadly, I had to return the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: ... I was looking for at a reasonable price so comfortable quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for at a reasonable price so comfortable quick delivery
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable sandals with good support underneath. Looked exactly as expected from online photo.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Price

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered seven and a half and got 8, little large but comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a 6 uk but needed a7 uk for a good
customer_reviews.text: Lovely sandals ordered a 6 uk but needed a7 uk for a good fit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals. Soo comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great sandals . Soo comfortable. Don't stop making this style!!
customer_reviews.author: legaleagle

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals fit me well and feel great when I am walking in them.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Janet Thompson

customer_reviews.title: feminine, nice looking sandal
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this sandal and the sole is incredibly comfortable. I found the sizing a bit small. I'm normally a 3, but ordered a 3.5 and they only just fit me. The ankle strap digs in a bit, but I walked for miles in them without much discomfort. Another reviewer had said that these sandals were smelly, which I thought was a bit silly until I wore mine!! They do have an unpleasant odour. Overall though, I'm very pleased with them, you can wear them with trousers or summer dresses and they don't look clumpy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have a collapse arch, which means that my choice of sandals is imited. Last summer I purchased a pair of brown Teva Tirra's which fitted purfectly. The sole cushions my arch and are very comfortable to wear walking and standing - I did not even have to break them in. This summer i opted to buy another pair. I choose this colour because I thought that they looked more dressey. Again there was no breaking in period, they fit purfectly and are as comfortable as my first pair. All in all a good buy if you have problems with your feet.
customer_reviews.author: pga

customer_reviews.title: comfortable sandals
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable sandal. Have bought Merrill brand in the past but as these sandals in beige was greatly reduced in price took a chance. I normally take a uk size 4.5 and took the advice of other reviewers and sized up to uk size 5. Fits perfectly so if you are in between sizes definitely size up. Would not normally order beige but they will go with lots of colours. They are extremely comfortable on and widths can be adjusted which is a must in hot temperatures whiltst walking on sightseeing holidays. Would order them again and get a different colour and pay more to as so comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Snawbaw

customer_reviews.title: Overall first impressions good, felt really comfy and especially like cushioned soles
customer_reviews.text: Overall first impressions good, felt really comfy and especially like cushioned soles. However, after wearing for a little bit of time find area of ankle strap on one foot rubbing and caused blister.It is near a seam where material overlapping, tightening, loosening ankle strap making no difference but ok when I turn overlapping material back on itself. Going to have to cut it off and hope that works otherwise going to be so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: quisy girl

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. I have many pairs in different colours ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I have many pairs in different colours and have introduced them successfully to most of my friends. They are so comfortable, need no wearing in and are very hard wearing. They are colourful, practical, feminine, but are also fashionable. I wear mine all year round because they are so comfortable. It is hard to take them off if it snows and I have to put boots on. I love them also as they are great in wet weather as they dry quickly and do not get all squishy like trainers etc do. I have mobility problems and the professionals always comment what great sandals they are to wear for people with my problems. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: zanylady

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and supportive sandal
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and supportive sandal, I can wear these all day long. The adjustability is great, especially across the toes allowing for a perfect fit (I have bunions). Only slight downside is for some reason in warm to hot weather these make my feet smell like no other pair of shoes I have - but as long as I wash them (and my feet) with shower gel each evening, and use a deodorising powder in the morning on the soles of my feet (e.g. Lush's T for Toes) then it's fine. I can certainly put up with that minor inconvenience in order to have comfortable feet!
customer_reviews.author: Vertandor

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I am usually a size 6 but ordered a size 7, they are a great fit and really comfy
customer_reviews.author: Olly

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend these sandals - they look great and are very ...
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these sandals - they look great and are very comfortable. Didn't require any 'breaking in'. Brilliant arch support and ideal for easing plantar fasciitis and heel pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastically comfortable sandals
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing sandals This is the fourth pair of Teva sandals I have bought because they are not so comfortable and I think they look stylish. Excellent for people with Tynosynovitis
customer_reviews.author: Prof sally Brown

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and made well. Attractive for an outdoor sandal
customer_reviews.author: Jane

product_meta.title: Teva Women's Tira Open Toe Sandals
product_meta.description:
The Tirra by Teva was designed specifically for a woman's foot in order to provide unmatched comfort and performance in the water and on land. With its unmistakably feminine strap configuration and multiple adjustment options for a secure fit, the Tirra can tackle any obstacle with ladylike grace - just like you.

 * The rubber outsole offers uncompromised grip and a water-channelling lug pattern helps to maintain solid footing. 
 * Water-ready synthetic and polyester webbing upper is highly durable and dries quickly after getting wet 
 * Easy hook-and-loop closure comes on and off quickly and gets the fit just right 
 * Contoured eva footbed supports your arch to keep your foot happy and healthy 
 * Treated with microban, a zinc-based antimicrobial technology that helps prevent stink 
 * A cushioned shoe pad in the heel absorbs impact where you need it most 
 * Spider original rubber outsole is highly durable and supplies significant traction 
 * Nylon shank stabilizes and supports your foot on uneven terrain

Teva was born in the Grand Canyon back in 1984, when a river guide rigged two Velcro watchbands to an old pair of flip flops and created a shoe that wouldn’t float away. Three decades later, we have grown up into an icon of comfort and utilitarian style.

How you choose to live is the utmost form of personal expression and around here, we want to seize every second - to live light and loud. If you are up for anything and love the thrill of spontaneity, then Teva is your people. This adventurous spirit - the one that pioneered the very first pair of Teva sandals - takes form in everything we create.
feature_bullets: Teva women sport sandal collection has everything an active women is looking for; comfort, durability and a feminine style
EVA top sole with Microban zinc
Spider original rubber traction outsole with water-channelling lugs
Activities: Travel, mountain trails, walk in park, city tripping
Ideal trail sandals for all sorts of surfaces, versatile and the quality you expect from Teva
